question: Your next-door neighbor likes to listen to music late at night. Because of the loud music, you often lose sleep.Write a letter to your neighbor. In your letterDescribe the situationExplain the problem it is causing youOffer at least one solution
text: Hello, how are you dear, I hope you are doing well ,actually I am writing this letter to inform you that I am struggling with my sleep these days because of your loud music at night, it is difficult for me to sleep for a long, most of the time it keeps me awake for the whole night and as a result, it feels like I am becoming insomniac.

Since, as you know that I am preparing for the IIT exam and I have to study for the whole day for at least  14 hours so at night I really need to have a good sleep to relax  but your music system does bother me a lot .

So, for this problem I would like to suggest the solutions which can help me to have a proper sleep , Firstly, can you please keep the volume down of your music system and also you can shut the doors and windows, so that voice doesn't come out.
I am really expecting a sort of help from your end.
